hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Salamah, Ummul Mu'minin: When the verse "That they should cast their outer garments over their persons" was revealed, the women of Ansar came out as if they had crows over their heads by wearing outer garments

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى { يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِنْ جَلاَبِيبِهِنَّ }
chapter.eng-name: The Statement Of Allah, Most High: Draw Their Jilbabs (Cloaks) All Over Their Bodies
